channel.title: Java/MySQL Intergration, How?
channel.description:
Hi, I'm trying to itergrate mySQL into my sevrer, But i cant work out how to get it too connect to database, Is this line correct?
[code=java] con = DriverManager.getConnection("jdbc:mysql://rsskills.co.uk/DATABASE", "USER", "PASS"); [/code]
